Name: DragonHill VR
About the game: This is an action-adventure game built for virtual reality. You play as an adventurer, freely roam and explore in a medieval open world. Complete a series of quests to unlock skills and upgrade equipment, and finally defeat the dragon in the hill cave. Game features: 1. Day and night system, experience the scenery of the medieval world at different times. 2. Realistic climbing and swimming system, roaming around castles, lakes and mountains. 3. Realistic combat system and sound effects. 4. Various weapon systems can be switched freely. 5. Character level and skill system. 6. AI interactive system. 7. Hidden characters and treasure chests are available for exploration. 8. Background music is suitable for the environment. 9. With high graphics quality, enhance the sense of immersion. 10. Support DLSS (only compatible with NVIDIA RTX Graphics card)
Meta Title: DragonHill VR: Dec 22, 2022, Eric Chuan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on DragonHill VR? Check out the release date (Dec 22, 2022), developer insights from Eric Chuan, and a complete game summary.
